title: Onboard a New Maintenance Vendor
description: A property management company wants to start using a new electrician. The office manager must onboard them.

tasks.description: Request necessary documents from the new vendor (e.g., proof of insurance, business license, W-9 form).
tasks.expected_outcome: An email is sent to the new vendor with a checklist of required documents.

tasks.description: Verify the vendor's insurance coverage and license are active and meet company requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Assistant confirms the vendor has at least $1 million in liability coverage by checking the provided certificate.

tasks.description: Create a new vendor profile in the property management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new vendor is added to the system with all their details, ready to be assigned work orders.
